name: Donald's Snow fight [Commodore 64]
description:
A retro fan game developed for the Commodore 64 and created to celebrate the classic animated short film with the same name.

You can play the game in a C64 emulator (VICE) or you can play it on a real C64  if you know how to do so. Or you can play it on TheC64/TheC64mini.

The story: Donald needs a bouquet of roses for his date with Dolly. His nephews have seven red roses but won't give it to him. They have hidden them in their seven snow castles and to get them Donald needs to beat them in snowball fighting.
